701262f-a.text:
Hoe Avenue (left), west side, north from its juncture with West Farms Road, showing St. John 's Roman Catholic Church at the S.W. corner of E. 167th Street. The 5 story building, on the right,
is No. l117-1121 West Farms Road.
April 26, 1938.
P. L. Sperr
